A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
I give the last Jedi 5 out of ten. 

Luke sky walker was done horribly. 

 a star destroyer is obviously slow as hell. 

The endless Chase of the rebel ships was just stupid. Terrible script. Really who thought this was a good idea!!! 

I felt like was was watching space balls at times. To much lame humor. Especially in the beginning. Set a bad tone. 

But I'm still glad I saw it and I'm sure I will watch the next one also.  

May the force be with you
